wiktionary_senses.definition: Used with the name of a place, especially of a country or its capital, to denote a neighborhood whose residents or storekeepers are from that place.
Used with the name of a place, especially of a country or its capital, to denote a neighborhood whose residents or storekeepers are from that place.
Small in extent of views or sympathies; narrow, shallow, contracted; mean, illiberal, ungenerous.
Not much, only a little: only a small amount (of).
Not much; not a large amount.
An adult in a child-like role, or in the more junior of two paired roles.
An adult in a child-like role, or in the more junior of two paired roles.
An adult in a child-like role, or in the more junior of two paired roles.
Ellipsis of little go (“type of examination”).
An unincorporated community in Breathitt County, Kentucky, United States, named after the local Little family.
An unincorporated community in Tyler County, West Virginia, United States.
